name: cloudflare-d1
description: Complete knowledge domain for Cloudflare D1 - serverless SQLite database on Cloudflares edge network. Use when: creating D1 databases, writing SQL migrations, configuring D1 bindings, querying D1 from Workers, handling SQLite data, building relational data models, or encountering D1_ERROR, statement too long, too many requests queued, migration failures, or query performance issues.
